name: Capricorn
text:
It might be a phone call, a visit, an email or a real, live letter. Some 
type of communication is about to come along that will be quite surprising. 
Don't let anyone overly pessimistic put a damper on the excitement.

name: Aquarius
text:
There's definitely romance in the air, which may have to do with a certain 
someone you recently met. Don't let anything like an age difference or 
geographical distance come between you. That can all be worked out.

name: Pisces
text:
It's still technically the weekend, so when the urge to go out and play 
hits you this evening, don't feel too bad about it. Besides, even if you're 
exhausted tomorrow, you can always take a power nap. Oh, go for it.

name: Aries
text:
After one more long, happy afternoon of easy dealings in your one-to-one 
relationships, you'll be ready for a nice, long nap. You'll have the chance 
to take one, too, thanks to a friend or coworker who'll be happy to cover 
for you.

name: Taurus
text:
You've been chatting up a storm for days, quite successfully getting 
everyone you know to see things exactly as you want them to. This evening, 
however, you'll suddenly want nothing more than easy, peaceful interactions.

name: Gemini
text:
Keeping a secret has never been a problem for you, but knowing that someone 
else is about to let one slip might be. In that case, you should try your 
best to talk them out of it. Then, let it go. You can only do so much.

name: Cancer
text:
Don't agonize about getting through the current dilemma you're dealing 
with. You'll do just fine. You may end up wondering exactly where the 
energy came from, but you won't have to worry about whether it will to show 
up.

name: Leo
text:
After days, or maybe even weeks, of trying, you're done. You're ready to 
say goodbye. Whether it's a person or a lifestyle that you're letting go 
of, it won't be easy -- but you'll do it. Just stay focused on your goal.

name: Virgo
text:
Your mouth is operating in a virtually unchained fashion. So when you 
decide -- and you're just about ready -- to put an end to a situation 
that's been doing you absolutely no good for far too long, you won't 
hesitate to announce it.

name: Libra
text:
The average bear might have problems dealing with today's astrological 
weather. You, however, are as persistent and resolute as a sign could 
possibly be. You'll get through it. And heaven help anyone who tries to get 
in your way.

name: Scorpio
text:
It's more than just a new week. You're getting started on a whole new 
attitude, and you've been thinking about introducing it to the world for 
some time. So when you're asked for your opinion on a subject that's near 
and dear, don't hesitate.

name: Sagittarius
text:
You're thinking of making a major purchase. You've been thinking about it 
for days -- maybe even weeks. Before you do, though, be sure you 
realistically take stock of what you have to spend. That means the checking 
account, the plastic and the ATM. Everything.

name: Capricorn
text:
Promises made now will be promises kept. No doubt about it. So when -- not 
if -- a dear one assures you that they'll keep their word, no matter what 
the issue happens to be, you won't need to doubt them.

name: Aquarius
text:
Family members will go out of their way to help you become accustomed to 
recent unexpected events, and your gratitude will know no bounds. Don't be 
shy about expressing it.

name: Pisces
text:
You're not usually much for staying in. Socializing with friends is the 
name of the game. At the moment, however, regardless of the fact that there 
is an appointment on your calendar, you're in the mood to stay in and get 
comfy. Why fight it?

name: Aries
text:
It's all good -- so no matter who you're dealing with, don't worry about 
any significant problems with them. Even if a 'situation' comes up, you'll 
be more than able to handle it, to the happy satisfaction of all parties 
concerned.

name: Taurus
text:
Not one word that emerges from your mouth will get there without lots and 
lots of thought on your part. So if anyone should be foolish enough to 
question you, they'll be silenced in quite rapid order.

name: Gemini
text:
An older or more experienced friend will be eager to help you out of a 
tight spot. Regardless of how you feel about accepting assistance, you 
really should allow them, just this once, to do it for you. It's your turn 
to be pampered.

name: Cancer
text:
This is a day that's been earmarked for exciting new beginnings of the most 
delightful kind. Ready or not, the heavens have arranged a buffet of 
startling events. Better cancel any plans you'd made that aren't written in 
stone.

name: Leo
text:
As of this evening, you'll be thinking specifically about one person -- 
just the one. You may need to spend your time with others, or be duty-bound 
to take care of responsibilities, but your mind won't be there.

name: Virgo
text:
It's time to pull back, to let others know that you're not a soft touch - 
at least, not as soft as they thought. In the meantime, standing your 
ground and actually saying no is a good place to start.

name: Libra
text:
It may suddenly be tougher to keep those plans you made. But considering 
the determination you are famous for, if there's anyone who can pull a 
rabbit out of a hat like this one, it's you.

name: Scorpio
text:
Romantically speaking, there could be a couple of roadblocks for you to 
overcome now -- but only if you let them get in the way. If anyone can 
think and plan their way out of a dilemma, it's you. Get busy.

name: Sagittarius
text:
Suddenly dreaming about shopping, even though you've got everything you 
need? Well, why deprive yourself? No one has absolutely every little thing. 
Paperclips? Bookends? There's got to be something you can use for an excuse.

name: Capricorn
text:
Once again, you'll have to find a happy medium between someone's extreme 
pessimism and your eagerness to make changes. Fortunately, you're the most 
cerebral sign out there, so the decision you make will be an intelligent, 
well-informed one.

name: Aquarius
text:
Yesterday's rather tense events could be repeated today, if you're not 
careful -- so be careful. Turn that watchfulness to all categories of your 
life, but especially any issues that boil down to family vs. career.

name: Pisces
text:
That secret you were hoping to hold onto forever? Looks like it won't be 
quite that long before it emerges. Don't get too worked up about it. It 
might be best to let this one see the light of day.

name: Aries
text:
Feel like something major is en route? Well, you're right. You may feel as 
if you're stalled or stuck in a rut at the moment, but not to worry. That 
won't be the case for long.

name: Taurus
text:
You're not unfamiliar with the concept of fighting for what you believe in, 
a skill that will come in handy now. If you've got something to say to 
someone who's been throwing their weight around, you'll have no problem. 
None at all.

name: Gemini
text:
You've just begun to realize how important it really is to keep that secret 
under wraps. So rather than just being irritated with someone who's kidding 
around about talking, put your foot down. Tell them that's not acceptable 
-- but not why.

name: Cancer
text:
You may be in the mood to hibernate. But if you don't want to do it alone 
-- don't! Invite a friend over for a video and a pizza. Remember, you can 
still have your privacy without becoming a recluse.

name: Leo
text:
Somewhere between lunch and dinner, your focus will shift from simply 
trying to get along to actually sharing something of yourself on a very 
deep level -- and you'll be ready to do whatever it takes to ensure that 
happens.

name: Virgo
text:
You were honorary class clown for years, but lately your personality has 
been intensifying -- and your friends are probably a bit confused by it. 
You'll be more like your old self today, though: the life of the party.

name: Libra
text:
A higher-up who's been acting rather strangely is finally ready to talk 
with you about what's been going on. It's up to you to ask the questions 
that will get you the answers you need. Prepare yourself.

name: Scorpio
text:
Got something romantic to share? Wait until later tonight to let the news 
fly. Not that it won't be welcome, whenever you mention it. But the later 
you reveal your feelings, the more accommodating your audience will be.

name: Sagittarius
text:
Your thoughts will turn to kindler, gentler subjects tonight -- things like 
romance, snuggling up and holding hands across the table. Fortunately, you 
won't be the only person in the vicinity thinking along those lines.
